name: Myoung Ho Kim
content: M.H.Kim: DB Lab, CS Dept., KAIST. Kim, Myoung Ho Professor, School of Computing, KAIST. E-mail: mhkim@kaist.ac.kr Quick Index About...        Profile   Activities   Projects   Courses   Publications        International Journals     Domestic Journals        International Conferences  Domestic Conferences        Books                      Patents                    Others Profile 1982: Seoul National University. B.S. 1984: Seoul National University. M.S. 1989: Michigan State University. Ph.D. 1996 - 1998: Editor-in-Chief, Database Review, KISS SIGDB 2004 - 2006: A member of the board of director, Korea Information Science Society 2004 - 2006: Chair, Special Interest Group in Databases, Korea Information Science Society 2006 - 2008: Editor-in-Chief, Journal of KIISE:Databases 1989 - Now: Professor, Dept. of Computer Science, KAIST 2010, 8 – 2015, 2: Dean, The Office of Academic Information, KAIST 2017.01 -2021.02: Head of School of Computing, KAIST Research Interests: Database, Distributed Systems, XML, Multimedia, Sensor Networks Academic Award, Korea Information Science Society, 2001/4/27 Special Academic Award, Korea Information Science Society, 2003/12/10
